name: Don't Bring a Croc to a Gunfight
name_original: Don't Bring a Croc to a Gunfight
description:
Main Idea:

Play as a lone croc on his quest to defeat the evil Gunslinger Croc as you dodge through his attacks wave after wave! Beware, your sword is unable to even leave a scratch on him, so you must think of an unconventional way of using it in order to defeat the boss and win the day!

This game was made in a 72 hour time frame for the Mashup Game Jam 2 to the theme of Unconventional Means.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys = Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Hold to charge sword (release to swing)

Team:

NovaKnight - Sprite Artist / Primary Coder

Taha - Digital Artist / Secondary Coder

Curruff - Composer

Nickaronii - Sound Effect Designer
